name: Small Lamp Grass
desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

customize.name: Small Lamp Grass Seed
customize.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Small Lamp Grass.

customize.name: Flora
customize.desc: Flora is the owner of the flower shop Floral Whisper. She is the younger sister of Chloris, a botanist who can be found in Windrise.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: "Pile 'Em Up"
customize.desc: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Small Lamp Grass
customize.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"
customize.desc: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Cheese

customize.name: Sunshine Sprat
customize.desc: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Small Lamp Grass
customize.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

customize.name: Woodland Dream
customize.desc: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.
